mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(DRUG_SHAPE) AS DRUG_SHAPE FROM PILL_MST;

SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(COLOR_CLASS1, ',', N), ',', -1)) AS COLOR FROM PILL_MST INNER JOIN ( SELECT 1 AS N UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 ) AS NUMS ON CHAR_LENGTH(TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM COLOR_CLASS1)) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM COLOR_CLASS1), ',', '')) >= N-1 WHERE TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(COLOR_CLASS1, ',', N), ',', -1)) IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(COLOR_CLASS1, ',', N), ',', -1)) <> '';

SELECT * FROM PILL_MST WHERE 1=1
AND DRUG_SHAPE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shape},'%')
AND CHARTN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{chartn},'%')
AND (COLOR_CLASS1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{color},'%') OR COLOR_CLASS2 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{color},'%'))
AND (LINE_FRONT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{line},'%') OR LINE_BACK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{line},'%'))
AND (PRINT_FRONT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{print},'%') OR PRINT_BACK LIKE CONCAT('%', #{print},'%'))
